Translations.Text: D$a, ih, a yim$eooqen, i illan d inekkaoen
a ppeccem, war ccekk, si ttejoa n Zaqqum
A ppacaoem segs ifwaden
Sinna, a ppernum tissit seg waman io$an
A ppetessem tissit ile$wman
D wagi ar asen d irsen, ass uqeiii
D Nekwni ikwen Ixelqen. Lemmer a ppamnem
Twalam l$ella id iteff$en segwen
D kunwi ip ixelqen, ne$ d Nekwni ay d ixellaqen
Nseyya tameppant garawen. Ur a£ izeggwir yiwen
iwakken a Nerr deg umkan nnwen wid i kwen icban; u kunwi, a kwen Nexleq d ayen ur tessinem
Ni$ tesnem axlaq amenzu, lemmer tesmektayem
Twalam ayen tkerrzem
D kunwi i t ikerzen, ne$ d Nekwni ay d imekrazen
Ma ihwa ya£, a t Nerr d uevim, d$a a kwen tekkat lwehma
Aql a$ nepwalas
Sennig waya: aql a$ neppueeooem
Twalam aman i teppessem
D kunwi iten id isse$layen seg usigna, ne$ d Nekwni
Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nerr d imeo$anen. A lemmer tesnemmiren
Twalam times i tesskarem s ueukku
D kunwi i s d ixelqen ttjuo is, ne$ d Nekwni ay d Ixellaqen
D Nekwni i p Irran d asmekti, u d laafia i wid ineewwaoen
Sbuccaa, s ccekoan, isem n Mass ik, Ameqwoaean
Ih, gulle$ seg wanda llan itran
U, tagi, lemmer a ppeeoem, ard tagallit tameqwoaeant
